This fun and practical book includes methods to help you connect with the Earth mother and your own natural self. Each chapter focuses on a different type of nature magick, from seed magick to the magick of the sun, of water, of the moon, and more—and every topic includes its own accompanying spells, charms, rituals, and meditations.

The Modern Witchcraft Book of Natural Magick is your complete guide to everything you’ll need to know about nature-based magick to fully embrace your spiritual and natural self.

yourgoddessyear.description_text:
Invoke the power of these 52 goddesses throughout the year to empower yourself and improve your life.

Women today are banding together in magical ways to celebrate and encourage one another, and many are turning to the sacred goddesses of the past to guide their way. Your Goddess Year provides a calendar of 52 goddesses along with fascinating background information, herstory, and reasons why invoking her power can strengthen and benefit you in your day-to-day life.

Learn about the powerful goddesses from all cultures and belief systems and call upon them during different times of the year to channel their strengths when you need them most. Including rituals to summon each goddess, you’ll always have the sacred feminine power supporting you. Celebrate the reawakening of the feminine divine and feminism by inviting a goddess to assist you and find the goddess that best speaks to you.

protectionspells.description_text: "Banish bad energy, ward off unpleasant people, and defend your belongings, your spirit and your space with this spellbook focused specifically on protection. In our modern world there is a lot to worry about, from the global-scale—climate change, political uncertainty—to the personal—a toxic ex, cyber bulling. Spellcrafting can help you find comfort in a stressful world. This book will give you the tools to take charge of defending yourself in both energy and physicality. With over 100 spells for protection and defense, and a glossary of protective symbols, stones, and other objects to keep on hand, this book can help you cleanse your room and cast out old negative energies, put a protective and peace-preserving bubble around yourself as you ride the bus, deflect grumpiness and negativity from people you work with—and so much more!"

modernwitchcraftguidetofairies.description_text: "Interact with magical fairy folk and incorporate them into your own witchcraft practice with this detailed account of the ancient wisdom and traditions of fairies and witchcraft. Fairies have long been a part of witchcraft traditions, especially Celtic and Norse witchcraft, paganism, and other traditions deeply tied to the earth. But these fairies aren’t the harmless creatures you’ve read about in children’s tales: they are magical creatures with their own culture and rules that you need to know before venturing into their territory. Now you can explore the world of the fairies and how their magic relates to your own witchcraft practice with The Modern Witchcraft Book of Fairies. This book provides you with all the information you need to know about the different types of fae folk and how you can safely interact with them to make the most of your witchcraft practice."

naughtyspellsandnicespells_sexyandscanda.description_text:
Naughty Spells/Nice Spells is a genuinely unique offering in this time-honored category. Tailored for readers' naughty sides and nice sides, both halves of this adorable volume feature a collection of simple, effective spells and charms anyone can whip up at home in no time.

Plus!Naughty Spells/Nice Spells boasts a unique spell rating that helps readers determine just how naughty - or nice - they'd like to be:

  • Silver spell = nice
  • Fog spell = mischievous
  • Smoky spell = slightly naughty
  • Nimbus spell = naughty

Filled with all-occasion spells for love, prosperity, and happiness, Naughty Spells/Nice Spells is the perfect book for anyone looking to bring more love, luck, and magick into their lives.

modernwitchcraftguidetothewheeloftheyear.human_name: Modern Witchcraft Guide to the Wheel of the Year
modernwitchcraftguidetothewheeloftheyear.description_text:
From the Modern Witchcraft series comes a complete guide to all of the sacred days and holidays of the Wiccan calendar—with spells, rituals, and other tips to celebrate.

In The Modern Witchcraft Guide to the Wheel of the Year, you’ll learn about the most celebrated days in the Wheel of the Year—Samhain, the end of the harvest season; Yule, the celebration of the New Year; Imbolc, the celebration of rebirth; Ostara, the arrival of Spring; Beltane, the celebration of Earth’s fertility; Litha, the song of the summer; Lughnasad, the halfway point between Summer and Autumn; and Mabon, the festival of home and harvest.

For each of these special days, there will be information about the history and its meaning, and the ways you can fully celebrate. Each chapter describes the celestial events associated with the sabbat, astrological influences during that time, meditation rituals, and charms to perform. It also includes a practical craft, such as candle making, that you can create to celebrate each day.

The Modern Witchcraft Guide to the Wheel of the Year is your complete guide to everything you need to know to celebrate the Wheel of the Year and the Wiccan sabbats, from Yule to Samhain, as part of your own spiritual practice.

greenwitchsgrimoire.description_text:
The author of The Green Witch, Arin Murphy-Hiscock, shows you how you can create your own green witch grimoire to record your favorite spells, recipes, rituals, and more.

A grimoire is essential for any witch wanting to capture and record spells, rituals, and secret ingredients. And for a green witch, a perfect place to reflect upon the power of nature, and document the stones, plants, flowers, oils, and herbs used in her practice. The Green Witch’s Grimoire finally is a place for all your prized knowledge.

From favorite spells to recipes, to blessing your grimoire and writing in secret script, you’ll make this book of shadows your own. Experienced witch Arin Murphy-Hiscock guides you on your path to creating your own personal book of your most cherished magic. Continue to hone your craft and grow into the green witch you’ve always dreamed of as you personalize your own Green Witch’s Grimoire.

wicca_amodernpractitionersguide.description_text:
Go beyond the basics of witchcraft and take your study of wicca to the next level: everything you need to know to have a deeper understanding of wicca, its teachings, and the meaning behind its rituals and practices.

You’ve bought your crystals and cast your basic spells, planted your herb garden and smudged your home—now what?

Wicca: A Modern Practitioner’s Guide takes you beyond the trendy witchy basics to the deeper roots the practice. This book will guide you in reexamining basic Wicca and teach you to create rich rituals that will foster your personal growth. It also includes comprehensive explanations of the traditions, beliefs, and rituals that make up the Wiccan religion. Read about Solitary Wicca, which teaches you how to practice wicca—whether you work with a coven or practice alone—and goes beyond the “how” of different practices to explore the “why”: for example, when should you create a sacred space rather than cast a circle? How and why do you purify yourself before a ritual? What is grounding and why is it important for you to ground yourself before doing spellwork? For those who seek them, Wicca has all the answers.

modernwitchcraftguidetomagickalherbs.human_name: Modern Witchcraft Guide to Magickal Herbs
modernwitchcraftguidetomagickalherbs.description_text:
Incorporate herbs into spells, rituals, and divination with this all-inclusive guide to the benefits of using herbal magic in witchcraft.

From creating potions to using dried herbs in rituals, herbal magic is a natural way to practice witchcraft. Herbs can be used in many different ways to help set the intention through every part of a witch’s process.

In The Modern Witchcraft Guide to Magickal Herbs, learn everything you need to use the most powerful herbs and use them as an essential part of your practice. Including information on which herbs are best for what kinds of spells, how to use herbs in divination and rituals, and step-by-step guides to making herbal bundles, potions, and sprays, this guidebook has all the important facts to make your herbal witchcraft a success.

Jam-packed with herbal ideas, this guide is perfect for both beginners and experienced witches looking to incorporate more herbs into their practice. Beautiful and functional, it is easy to navigate and offers a detailed guide to herbal magic!

modernguidetowitchcraft.description_text:
Unlock your highest potential, achieve your deepest desires, and delve into the world of witchcraft.

Looking for an enchanting love potion? Want to create your own sacred space and promote good energy? The Modern Guide to Witchcraft helps you harness your own inner power so you can shape your destiny.

With the help of spellcraft expert Skye Alexander, you'll tap into your own magic and create incantations, potions, and charms. As she carefully guides you through each step of these witchcraft practices and details ways of personalizing them to your specific situation, you'll gain confidence in your own knowledge and inner force.

Once you learn to harness your natural talents as a witch, you'll discover that a whole new world of possibilities exists.

worldreader.description_text:
Donations to support Worldreader are made to PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Worldreader is a global nonprofit bringing digital books children and their families, empowering them to read, think, and grow in order to improve their lives and their world. In its first five years, Worldreader has reached 5.6 million readers in 69 countries with a digital library of 28,500 local and international e-books to e-readers and mobile phones, and aims to reach 10 million readers with its digital library by the end of 2015 and 15 million readers by 2018. To read free books on your mobile phone, visit booksmart.worldreader.org For more information on Worldreader, visit http://www.worldreader.org.

from_bundle.tile_short_name: Midsummer Magick & Witchcraft by Adams Media
from_bundle.marketing_blurb: Get Moon Magic, House Witch, Hex Your Ex, Green Witch, Green Witch's Garden, Green Witch's Grimoire, and more!
from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb: A world of witchcraft and helpful rituals awaits! Summon an amazing library of mystical ebooks and get the Midsummer Magick & Witchcraft Bundle today. This collection is perfect for budding Green Witches, mixologists, and Moon Witches. Master spells, herbology, and potion-making with books like Green Witch's Garden, Modern Witchcraft Book of Astrology, Hex Your Ex, and more—pay what you want and help support Worldreader!
from_bundle.author: Simon & Schuster

basic_data.human_name: MEGA MIX Unity Asset Store Pack
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: Dive into our latest Humble Software Bundle and add hot new assets to your next game or creative project! The Unity Asset Mega Mix Bundle offers 25+ outstanding asset packs bursting with style. Pay what you want and get amazing asset packs like the Modular Castle & Dungeon pack, Blood Effects Pack, Mystify FX pack, and more. Get the professional-quality assets you need to help bring your game to life, and help support Girls Who Code with your purchase!
basic_data.description:
Hot new assets for Unity. Dive into our latest Humble Software Bundle and add hot new assets to your next game or creative project! The Unity Asset Mega Mix Bundle offers 25+ outstanding asset packs bursting with style. Pay what you want and get amazing asset packs like the Modular Castle & Dungeon pack, Blood Effects Pack, Mystify FX pack, and more. Get the professional-quality assets you need to help bring your game to life, and help support Girls Who Code with your purchase!

Pay $1 or more. Normally, the total cost for the software in this bundle is as much as $1,209. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $1 purchase. Pay $1 or more to access keys.

Redeem your keys. Keys are redeemed through the Unity Asset Store.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the developer and to support Girls Who Code. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

horrormultiplayergametemplate.description_text: Create AAA-quality multiplayer horror games with this feature-rich, production-ready template. Players take on the role of survivors trying to escape, or killers hunting them down. Packed with essential systems, it delivers the core mechanics that power polished and immersive horror experiences. Add and customize characters, abilities, maps, and items using modular components built for scalability and speed.

mystifyfx.description_text: Mystify FX offers a robust collection of high-performance shaders dedicated to distortion, refraction, and blending. Achieve a wide spectrum of stylized visual effects, from subtle heat haze and liquid-like surfaces to dynamic warping and seamless layer blending. Each shader is highly customizable, providing granular control over parameters to fine-tune the look and feel of your effects. Optimized for performance, Mystify FX allows you to enhance your project's aesthetic without sacrificing frame rate. Whether you're aiming for subtle environmental enhancements or dramatic visual transformations, Mystify FX provides the versatility and power you need to bring your artistic vision to fruition effortlessly.

wireframeshader.description_text:
Enhance visual representation of your 3D model by emphasizing the underlying structure, revealing the edges and form in a clear, geometric style. This shader is ideal for creating stylized graphics, analyzing mesh topology, or debugging geometry.

Designed for seamless compatibility across all devices, including mobile, VR, and high-end PCs, this shader maintains consistent visual quality without any compromises.

With one-node integration support for Unity's Shader Graph and Amplify Shader Editor, Wirframe Shader ensures limitless customization possibilities. Developers and artists can craft unique shader effects and variations effortlessly, unlocking unlimited creative potential.

sci-fibosspack.description_text: This pack contains 7 Animated game-ready characters. The main feature of this pack is carefully crafted animations to make the battles even more exciting. 7 characters, each character have 4-5 skin unique 24-48 animations for each characters

lowpolytreespack_lmhpoly.description_text:
1170 game-ready low poly tree assets optimized for low-end PC, console, VR, and mobile devices. Just drag and drop to your scene to achieve beautiful results in no time.

PACKAGE CONTAINS 446 unique low poly tree prefabs in different types + the same 446 tree prefabs with snow. 114 unique low poly wood prefabs like stumps, logs, and firewood + the same 114 wood prefabs with snow. 12 other prefabs like palm leaves, pine spikes, apples, and coconuts + the same 12 prefabs with snow.

Also, you get 26 BONUS prefabs like tileable terrain & water planes, hills, mountains, clouds, and 3 simple scripts for the camera, sun, and cloud control.

FEATURES LODs Optimized colliders. Lightmap baking support. Real-world scale. Easy to change colors. Easy to use. Detailed documentation.

lightingbox2next-genlightingsolution.description_text: This is a real time saver solution to get AAA looking lighting in a few seconds or minutes even without any lighting experience

3dfish.description_text: With its clean and stylish low-poly visuals, this asset allows you to quickly and easily create optimized 3D ocean environments for casual games. It features a variety of fish, marine props, and built-in animations, enabling efficient scene construction and expressive game atmospheres.

toonsuburbanpack.description_text:
Kick-start your level building with this stylized urban environment:

Over 800 prefabs, ranging from modular buildings and interior assets, to vehicles, road systems and characters.

• Modular assets for building your own houses, interiors, shops and much more.

• Over 70 pre-made building and interior presets.

• Vehicles with interiors and openable doors, trunks and detachable wheels.

• Customizable characters and pre-made presets.

• A large showcase scene incorporating all the assets from the package.

intrigues_unity.description_text: Intrigues lets you create dynamic families, factions, and branching narratives without writing a single line of code. Designed with a AAA-quality node-based editor, it empowers you to build rich, interactive stories full of secrets, shifting alliances, and emergent drama. Perfect for RPGs, strategy, and simulation games, Intrigues enhances your project with systems that spark curiosity and reward player exploration. All logic is visual, modular, and fully editor-driven — bring your world to life with depth and intrigue.

bloodeffectspack.description_text:
Deliver intense gore and visceral impact with this high-quality blood effects pack for Unity.

Compatible with Built-in RP, URP, and HDRP (URP/HDRP shaders created via Shader Graph), it includes lightweight, PBR-based, mobile-friendly assets optimized for real-time performance.

Packed with blood splashes, decals, projectors, gut effects, and UI screen overlays, each prefab is ready to drag-and-drop into your scenes with minimal setup. Perfect for horror, action, or stylized games that demand fast, dramatic visual feedback and a polished look — across desktop, console, and mobile platforms, including Unity 6.

modularcastleanddungeon_naturemanufactur.description_text: Over 1000 models in 1300 prefabs will help you to build castles, dungeons, towns, towers, temples, bridges, and walls. The pack contains modular content from small elements like ornaments up to big objects like whole towers. A complex demo scene 1x1 km with indoor and outdoor locations shows you all the options and power of the pack. Advanced fast shaders allow you to vertex paint, heat, glow, make objects wet, or even top/snow cover your objects to customize them even more. A detailed tutorial connected with the asset will help you use all the pack's features.

cyberpunk_cybercityhdrpplusbip.description_text:
This bundle includes full modular pack for creating high detailed realistic cyberpunk city, streets, alleys, city blocks etc.

Includes: walls, windows, doors, props, wires, lights, neons, advertisements, cars, robots... etc.

Also contains 3d physics based route system for robots.

You can create realistic city, sci-fi, modern-retro, vintage, fantasy, retro cyberpunk, XXI century-light - 'any colour you like'.' Note: Human example models not included.

battleships2.description_text: Battleships 2 by FORGE3D—a premium space ships fleet pack featuring 25 uniquely designed ships, 27 modular turrets, and 13 structures and props. Compatible with Unity's Built-in, URP, and HDRP render pipelines, it offers flexible customization options, including team colors, engine glows, and emissive effects via Amplify Shader Editor. Perfect for prototyping or production, Battleships 2 delivers a polished, ready-to-deploy arsenal for any sci-fi universe.

everydaymotionpack.description_text:
EverydayMotionPack is a hand-crafted animation set built for Unity creators who want to add life and realism to their characters through everyday motions. This pack offers a curated selection of socially-driven movements like walking with purpose, standing casually, gesturing during conversation, reacting naturally, and transitioning smoothly between idle states.

Optimized for Unity’s Humanoid rig system, each animation is loop-ready, lightweight, and easy to integrate. The focus isn’t on flashy or exaggerated actions—but on subtle, believable motions that bring out personality in NPCs and main characters alike.

Perfect for indie developers and small studios, this pack makes it simple to create immersive social spaces, dialogue-driven scenes, or background character animations in a fraction of the time. Whether you’re building a slice-of-life simulation, a narrative game, or a mobile app with interactive characters, EverydayMotionPack gives you the tools to make your virtual world feel truly alive.

girlswhocode.description_text:
Donations to support Girls Who Code are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Girls Who Code, a nonprofit organization, was founded in 2012 to encourage more young women to complete a college-level computer science education and gain skills to further enhance their employability. Mobilizing leading executives, educators, and engineers, Girls Who Code has developed a new model of computer science education designed to inspire, educate, and equip girls of all experience levels and backgrounds with the skills to succeed in the field.

In just three years, Girls Who Code has already begun to move the needle: through rapid iteration and expansion of our Summer Immersion Program and highly-scalable Clubs Program, Girls Who Code has delivered 3,000+ hours of instruction to 3,000+ girls nationwide. Our programs have earned support from the CEOs of top Fortune 500 companies, engaged 700+ industry professionals, delivered among the most robust dataset on computer science education, and been featured in 100+ publications, from The New York Times to the Today Show. Our alumnae are overwhelmingly choosing to major in computer science or related studies and consistently name Girls Who Code's programs as their chief incentive to do so.

Girls Who Code is dedicated to closing the gender gap in the technology world. Supporting the work of Girls Who Code is an opportunity to empower the engineers, innovators, and executives of tomorrow.

smoothsync.description_text:
Smooths Rigidbodies and Transforms over the network with ease. Just add the SmoothSync script to any game object and watch it be smoooooth.

Simple drop-in setup for Netcode for GameObjects, Mirror, PUN, PUN2, MLAPI, FishNet, and UNet. No coding required!

We aimed to improve NetworkTransform on all fronts. Smooth Sync is more configurable, uses less bandwidth, and gives you smoother and more accurate syncing of your objects. We only send what you need, reducing the networking costs over Unity's Network Transform by up to 60%.

Ideal for syncing anything that moves. Vehicles, character controllers, even objects controlled by physics. Works great even at low send rates.

Used by over 1 million gamers!

volfx_vfxtoolkit.description_text:
VolFx ☄ – Stylized Unity VFX Toolkit

• Give your Unity game a cinematic makeover with VolFx – a modular stylized VFX toolkit that makes every scene feel like art. • Modular Pipeline: Reorder and stack custom post-process passes and shaders for unique visuals • Selective Effects: Apply FX only to chosen objects (e.g. blur a background behind a character) using Unity layer masks • Real-time Control: Tweak effects at runtime via Unity’s Volume profiles and Timeline for dynamic, on-the-fly adjustments • Cinematic Stylization: Includes pre-built stylized FX (impacts, magic, filmic filters, etc.) to add a hand-crafted, game-inspired flair.

VolFx is lightweight, easy to integrate, and ideal for any project seeking a stylized, cinematic VFX boost.

cartoonfx4remaster.description_text:
Cartoon FX 4 Remaster"" is the fourth pack in a series of stylized particle effects for Unity.

This one is mainly focused on environmental, space and weapons effect, with 50+ prefabs included along with some variants for them.

They are ready to be used in a project by directly instantiating the prefabs through your scripts, and are easily customizable if your code architecture is more demanding.

An editor is included to easily change the colors, hues, speed, size, etc. of the effects without needing to go deep into editing the various particle systems that each effect has.

As a bonus, a discount is automatically applied for the ""Cartoon FX Remaster Bundle"" on the Unity Asset Store if you own a license of any of the four included packs (thus including this one)

kaykit_dungeonremasteredpackforunity.description_text: The KayKit - Dungeon Remastered Asset Pack includes 280+ stylized 3D dungeon assets and props. Build your ideal dungeon with modular floors, walls, stairs, doors, and decorate with chests, barrels, traps, furniture, tavern pieces, a modular bar, beds, and more. All models are low-poly optimized, textured, and suitable for any platform (including mobile). Each asset is carefully crafted to ensure a consistent visual style and easy implementation. A perfect starting point for any gamedev creating a roguelike, dungeon crawler, or top-down RPG!

sci-fiarsenal.description_text:
Created for Unity's Built-in Render Pipeline, with an upgrade package included for the Universal Render Pipeline.

This vibrant collection of particle effects is built to light up sci-fi battles and bring energy to your worlds—whether you're crafting a action filled shooter, a tense RPG, or a fast-paced platformer.

The pack features 92 unique effects and over 580 prefabs, organized into intuitive categories and offered in multiple color variations to suit a wide range of styles. From missiles and flamethrowers to explosions and impact bursts, each effect is designed to be responsive, eye-catching, and easy to drag & drop or instantiate into any project scene.

With additive textures that deliver a glowing look without the need for post-processing, these FX are ideal for both 2D and 3D games. A demo project is included to help you preview and test everything right away. Simply import the asset (and upgrade to Universal if needed), add the scenes to build settings and press play in any scene to browse the effects freely.

advancedfoliagepack.description_text:
Group of foliage, grass, flowers, roots, trunk models, and ground textures. Asset data were scanned and carefully optimized. Shaders for foliage, rocks, and trunks support dynamic snow cover.

Content: • 29 ground texture sets; • 10 grass atlas sets; • 20 Unity grass billboards; • 26 Unity grass optimized • 2 scanned, optimised trunks with snow version; • 6 root models with snow version; • In ground textures you will find: needles, litter, sand, road, dirt, mud, moss, roots, rocks, leaves, grass, pebbles, stones, snow • Built-in, URP, and HD RP support; • 6 grass shaders (lite, standard specular with snow variants); • 4 standard shaders with snow support; • SRP batcher and DOTS instancing support for HD and URP • All shaders have a snow support version."

6000fantasyicons_unity.description_text: A large set of icons in fantasy style. Here you will find all types of icons, as the package includes: skill, item, profession, weapon, armor, building and avatar icons. All icons are hand-drawn in the same style, it is also well-combined with both classic and flat-style interfaces.

speechrecognitionsystem.description_text:
Real-time voice recognition system.

Features: • Does not require Internet connection; • High quality and speed of speech recognition; • Supports 24 different languages; • Possibility to work with Oculus Quest; • Multiplatformity (Windows, iOS, Android, macOS, Linux); • Easiness of integration.

horrorprison.description_text: Horror Prison is a modular interior environment of an isolated island prison where secret experiments went horribly wrong. The asset includes only indoor corridors and rooms (no exterior), and supports HDRP, URP, and Built-in pipelines. Designed for PC projects and VR with scene optimization. Perfect for horror games focused on isolation and unease.

dragons_fantasyrpg_customizabledragonpac.human_name: Dragons - Fantasy RPG - Customizable Dragon Pack
dragons_fantasyrpg_customizabledragonpac.description_text:
AAA quality modular dragons! 3 Heads, 2 Tails, Mesh Morphing, and more. These animated dragons are among the most popular on the Asset Store and look amazing in games.

Customize the dragons with multiple body parts, saddle parts, and mesh morphing to achieve unique looks among hordes of bad guys.

fishnetpro_networkingevolved.description_text: Fish-Networking (FishNet) is a powerful, open-source Unity networking library built for modern multiplayer games. It offers high performance, flexible server-authoritative architecture, and out-of-the-box features like prediction, lag compensation, scene management, and networked physics. Designed with scalability and ease of use in mind, FishNet supports both client-hosted and dedicated server models. Whether you're building fast-paced action games or large online worlds, FishNet gives you the tools and control needed to create smooth, secure, and responsive multiplayer experiences.

5000fantasyicons.description_text: A large set of icons in fantasy style. Here you will find all types of icons, as the package includes: skill, item, profession, weapon and armor icons. All icons are hand-drawn in the same style, it is also well-combined with both classic and flat-style interfaces.

drawxxl.description_text:
Draw XXL is an extensive set of visual debugging and development tools. It can be used as components without any code or like debug lines as one-line-calls from anywhere in your code.

Whether you are just looking to increase your options from Unitys limited Debug.DrawLine(), learn some more about the Game Engine by visualizing basics like quaternion and euler rotations or boost your productivity with charts or physics visualization: Draw XXL got it covered.

Works in Edit Mode, Play Mode and in builds. Can draw as gizmo lines, debug lines, handles lines or as mesh. Full C# source code included. Draws shapes, text, game engine basics, charts, physics, measurements, icons, in world space and screen space.

girlswhocode.description_text:
Donations to support Girls Who Code are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Girls Who Code, a nonprofit organization, was founded in 2012 to encourage more young women to complete a college-level computer science education and gain skills to further enhance their employability. Mobilizing leading executives, educators, and engineers, Girls Who Code has developed a new model of computer science education designed to inspire, educate, and equip girls of all experience levels and backgrounds with the skills to succeed in the field.

In just three years, Girls Who Code has already begun to move the needle: through rapid iteration and expansion of our Summer Immersion Program and highly-scalable Clubs Program, Girls Who Code has delivered 3,000+ hours of instruction to 3,000+ girls nationwide. Our programs have earned support from the CEOs of top Fortune 500 companies, engaged 700+ industry professionals, delivered among the most robust dataset on computer science education, and been featured in 100+ publications, from The New York Times to the Today Show. Our alumnae are overwhelmingly choosing to major in computer science or related studies and consistently name Girls Who Code's programs as their chief incentive to do so.

Girls Who Code is dedicated to closing the gender gap in the technology world. Supporting the work of Girls Who Code is an opportunity to empower the engineers, innovators, and executives of tomorrow.
